game.title: Save the Kingdom from the Dark Lord
game.objective: Vanquish the dark lord and restore peace to the realm
game.description: The kingdom is beleaguered by an evil sorcerer, whose malevolent forces threaten everything. As a valiant hero, your quest is to vanquish him and bring prosperity back. Embark on a perilous adventure teeming with challenges, riddles, and enchanted artifacts.
game.reward: True Heart of the Ancients, granting eternal wisdom

task.objective: Uncover the hidden treasure map in the Forbidden Castle
task.description: Courageously explore the Forbidden Castle and decipher the ancient riddle to find the map.

task.objective: Retrieve the Gauntlet of Shadow, a powerful safeguard
task.description: The sorcerer has placed the Gauntlet in his high-security tower. Navigate through traps to claim it.

task.objective: Battle the Dark Lord's henchman at the Shadow Peak
task.description: The dark lord's most trusted servant guards the path to his lair. Defeat him and pave the way for the final showdown.
